listings.name: Cardinal Point Vineyard & Winery
listings.description: Family-owned boutique winery specializing in small-batch Virginia wines. Intimate tasting room with panoramic views of the Rockfish Valley. Known for their award-winning Viognier and Petit Verdot. Hosts wine and cheese pairings every Saturday afternoon.

listings.name: Rockfish River Kayaking Adventures
listings.description: Guided kayak tours and rentals on the scenic Rockfish River. Perfect for beginners with gentle Class I-II rapids. Half-day and full-day trips available. All equipment provided including life jackets and dry bags. Experienced guides share local history and wildlife knowledge.

listings.name: Mountain Rose Wellness Spa
listings.description: Luxury mountain spa offering massages, facials, body treatments, and yoga classes. Uses organic and locally-sourced products. Indoor saltwater pool and eucalyptus steam room. Couples' massage suites with private balconies overlooking the mountains.

listings.name: The Copper Pot Restaurant
listings.description: Farm-to-table dining featuring seasonal menus with ingredients from local farms. Cozy atmosphere with exposed brick and wood beams. Specializes in Southern comfort food with modern twists. Famous for their fried green tomatoes and bourbon pecan pie.

listings.name: Appalachian Horse Adventures
listings.description: Guided horseback riding through scenic mountain trails. Rides range from 1-hour beginner trips to full-day advanced wilderness excursions. Well-trained horses suitable for all experience levels. Sunset rides include wine and cheese on the mountaintop.

listings.name: Nelson County Farmers Market
listings.description: Year-round indoor farmers market featuring local produce, artisan breads, handmade crafts, and specialty foods. Saturday mornings from 8am-noon. Live music and cooking demonstrations. Support over 40 local vendors and makers.

listings.name: St. George Brewing Company
listings.description: Nanobrewery and taproom in historic downtown Lovingston. Rotating selection of Belgian-style ales, IPAs, and seasonal brews. Intimate atmosphere with local art on the walls. Bring your own food or order from nearby restaurants. Trivia nights every Thursday.

listings.name: Blackrock Summit Trail
listings.description: Moderate 1-mile hike to unique rock scramble summit with 360-degree views. Part of the Appalachian Trail. Especially popular at sunrise and sunset. Rocky terrain with some challenging sections near the top. Bring sturdy hiking boots.
listings.address: Blue Ridge Parkway MP 84.8, Montebello, VA 24464
